column5: message
Update README.md
fix issue #105 - Upgrate buildin version of bootstrap-datepicker
Pagination now takes 'size' and 'align' parameters
Allow specifying extra css classes for pagination
More explicit setting for TEMPLATE_DEBUG
Added bootstrap_icon template tag
Less spacing in button HTML
Added bootstrap_button to change log
Small fixes, new bootstrap_button template tag
Version 2.13.4
Better fix for #84
Added clarification for Django >= 1.3
Added assertion of Django >= 1.5 to demo app (fixes #84)
Remove use of reserved keyword "float" fixes #76
Fix bug caused by non-empty TEMPLATE_STRING_IF_INVALID in settings (fixes #81)
MANIFEST fix #79
Version to 2.13.0 for PyPI
Bumped CDN Bootstrap version to 2.3.2
Version bump for bug fixes
Code outline fix
Fix small bug in demo app
Removed class based views from pull request, kept the bug fixes.
Removed extra space
added: class based views + small inline fix
Simple form set support, fix #55 (see demo_app)
Vesrion bump, small change to README
Small fixes to BootstrapDateInput widget
Datepicker component now checks if locale JS exists
Version bump, date picker update
Minor version bump because PyPI was acting up
Most obnoxious pagination bug ever
Fix bug in pagination (was unresolved)
Fix bug in pagination
Fix bootstrap_css_tag to allow responsive parameter
Fix #73 Python 3 import
Version bump
Updated datepicker from https://github.com/eternicode/bootstrap-datepicker
Version bump, slight rewrite of fix for #68
fix #68
Quick fix for #63 and #64, no longer depend on format_html_join
Making format_html_join work for Django < 1.5, fix #64 (testing required)
Fix #65, bootstrap assets url changed, moved version to separate file
Make pagination template tag remove page=XXX from url before adding
Added bootstrap_pagination tag, fixes #62
Django 1.5 fixes
Bump to 2.9.0, renamed display_attr to html_attrs
Added TextArea to demo app, fixes #53
Fix README
Added template tags for messages, form and fields
Security fix (value for BootstrapUneditableInput widget was not properly escaped)
Added bootstrap_messages template tag (fix #57) and improved handling of bootstrap javascript loading
Added template for messages, still have to implement template tag
Fix #58, bug with multiple select
Do not show double label for horizontal checkbox (fixes #51, thanks @jenlu for reporting)
New filter: pagination (see demo_app)
Improved pager
Version bump & typo fix
put bootstrap variable inside the constructor method to maintain enclosure
Datepicker fix
Fixed missing space
Updated datepicker from https://github.com/eternicode/bootstrap-datepicker
Fix #47, also renamed test_* to demo* and updated README
added BootstrapPasswordInput

Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/dyve/django-bootstrap-toolkit

Conflicts:
	bootstrap_toolkit/static/bootstrap_toolkit/js/init_datepicker.js
	bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_choices.html
	bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_errors.html
	bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_help.html
	bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_horizontal.html
	bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_inline.html
	bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_vertical.html
Reinstated bootstrap_input_type, bug fix in date widget
Removed obsolete variable check, fixes #40
Added Andy Rowles and link to datepicker to Thanks
Better documentation in readme, fixes #44
Proper support for date input (fixed js), support Django language setting
Simplified date picker options, access no longer via CSS class, added DATE_INPUT_FORMAT support
Fix UI bug in demo HTML
New widget "BootstrapUneditableInput"
Added BootstrapTextInput with prepend/append, this should probably be a mixing, will get to that later
Fixed inline bugs, bumped version, did my best to make error texts behave in appropriate inline/block mode
Fixes 'inline=True' statement when including field_help.html
Removed redundant logic. Simplified code.
version++
Updated date picker js from https://github.com/eternicode/bootstrap-datepicker
Fixed bug in datepicker template code
Fixed datepicket-widget changes https://github.com/phughes/django-bootstrap-toolkit/commit/6e3555b0ac93f0c6521d133494f09f116ccf212f
Fixed prepend / append missing bug for regular TextInput widget due to incorrect "bootstrap" dict check in template. Code cleanup.
Fixed bug in float template code
Fixed a bug where the date input field would be styled in the same way as the date picker popup.
fix bug: choice_id can be string or integer :P
remove console
choice_id must be string
add control-row to form

Update bootstrap_toolkit/templates/bootstrap_toolkit/field_choices.html

Forces unicode for comparison of choice values and field values
according to documentation horizontal-forms displays errors on the same line of controls
changed the include's context variables to string because Django template syntax doesn't recognize boolean

Display default empty template value if as_bootstrap can't render.

If the template code basses in an empty context variable, the
`bootstrap_input_type` templatetag throws a ValueError that's difficult
to debug.  This patch changes the template tag to just show an empty
string (or whatever is defined in TEMPLATE_STRING_IF_INVALID), so the
debugging can be done at the rendering level.

Modified bootstrap_toolkit.py to support users with a single
bootstrap.js file while preserving existing behavior.
Added default settings to settings.py.
Removed redundant "required" class in vertical form label in favor of the new "control-group" markup.
Fixed invalid "for" attribute in label for multicheckbox and radioset.
Added "required" class to vertical form label.
Fixed no value bug.
Added support in vertical & inline forms too.
Added Bootstrap prepended & appended text support. Fixed auto_id bug.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master'
Added Bootstrap alert style for non_field_errors.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master'
Code cleanup.
Add inline choice fields (radio button, checkbox) support. Use "as_bootstrap_inline_choices" to enable.
Fix checkbox template
Update to bootstrap 2.0.0
Updated the README to give the command to download from pypi.

Added a setup.py.

I also deleted the symlink test_project/bootstrap. Now, to run the
test_project, you have to django-bootstrap installed.  I have added a
few lines in the readme to explain how to install in the general case,
and how to install for development.
